name: Sparky
description: Sparky is an oscilloscope-themed robot belonging to the WebtrES club. With its shiny yellow box and classic buttons, it is a charming and reliable companion. Its arms and legs are designed with the hands-down configuration, allowing it to interact with the world in a friendly and approachable manner. The screen of Sparky displays a cute cat image, adding a touch of playfulness to its appearance. Additionally, Sparky is equipped with a helmet addon for enhanced protection and functionality.
